General.Name: Aton Resources Inc
General.Description: Aton Resources Inc., a mineral exploration company, explores for and develops mineral properties in the Arab Republic of Egypt. The company primarily explores for gold, silver, copper, and zinc deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Abu Marawat concession covering an area of approximately 448 square kilometers located in Arabian-Nubian Shield, Egypt that explores for the Hamama West gold-silver deposit and Abu Marawat gold-silver-copper-zinc vein deposit, as well as operates Rodruin mineral deposit. The company was formerly known as Alexander Nubia International Inc. and changed its name to Aton Resources Inc. in June 2016. Aton Resources Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3P6
